page.title: 11ELPHINSTONE GRAVEYARD
page.content: THE GRAVEYARD NEAR ELPHINSTONE PRIMARY SCHOOL IS A LITTLE SPOOKY. THERE IS A SKULL AND CROSSBONES GRAVESTONE THERE. THE SKULL AND CROSSBONES MEANS THAT THE PERSON THAT DIED,DIED OF THE PLAGUE. THE GRAVESTONE IS SO OLD WE COULDN'T SEE WHOSE GRAVE IT WAS. IT HAD MOSS AND CREEPY CRAWLIES ON IT. BEYOND THE GRAVEYARD IS A NATURE TRAIL. THERE IS A PATH THAT LEADS DOWN TO A LITTLE RIVER . IN THE RIVER THERE IS A LOT OF JUNK INCLUDING A DARTBOARD. NO FISH COME DOWN THE RIVER,IT IS PROBABALY CONTAMINATED BUT IN THE SUMMER YOU FIND TADPOLES, FROG SPAWN AND FROGS. IN THE WINTER IT GETS DRAINED OUT. IF YOU WALK STRAIGHT ON YOU WILL FIND MANY PLANTS. THERE ARE PINE TREES AND BRACKEN AND MARES TAILS.
